item.title: How to run Jenkins server on EC2 with Packer?
item.description: In this tutorial you will find how to deploy Jenkins server running on EC2 instance.

item.title: How to deploy Streamlit app on Azure with Docker and Terraform?
item.description: In this tutorial you will find how to deploy a simple Streamlit application on Azure using Container instances.

item.title: How to install OracleDB on EC2 instance running Oracle Linux 7?
item.description: In this tutorial you will find how to install OracleDB on a EC2 instance running Oracle Linux 7 (OL7).

item.title: Data obfuscation with AWS (RDS, Lambda and API Gateway)
item.description: Simple project that I made to familiarise myself with some of the AWS services.
